events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle hitting a guardrail on 2024-04-30.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident following review of the initial accident description.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the case for timely processing.
Customer received confirmation that the insurance claim has been officially acknowledged and logged.
Request sent for police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted police report, photos of damage, and detailed repair cost estimates for evaluation.
Investigation team initiated full review of submitted documents and physical inspection scheduled.
The investigation concluded confirming the accident details and verifying extent of vehicle damage.
Settlement offer proposed to the customer covering approved repair costs and loss of use expenses.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed gratitude for efficient handling.
Final approval granted to proceed with claim payout and repair coordination with authorized service center.
Insurance payment was issued successfully to cover vehicle repairs as per the approved settlement.
Claim has been officially closed following full settlement payment and completion of vehicle repairs.
All files and correspondence related to this auto accident claim have been securely archived.
